content:
github-actions[bot] commented on Issue #2047:

Subscribe to Label Action

cc @bnjbvr

<details>
This issue or pull request has been labeled: "cranelift", "cranelift:area:aarch64"

Thus the following users have been cc'd because of the following labels:

  • bnjbvr: cranelift

To subscribe or unsubscribe from this label, edit the <code>.github/subscribe-to-label.json</code> configuration file.

Learn more.
</details>

alexcrichton commented on Issue #2047:

We currently have a check with Rust 1.41 on CI, but is this perhaps not caught there because the arm64 backend isn't included as part of that check? Could CI get tweaked to enable all arches in cranelift for that cargo check?

cfallin commented on Issue #2047:

Good idea; added cranelift-tools to the crates checked on 1.41 (along with codegen and wasm), which pulls in all backends.
